attributes.action: Stop Right To Buy Of Council Housing
attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls on the government to end the right to buy policy of selling council housing in an attempt to tackle a national shortage of council housing and to get back to the original purpose of providing public housing for local councils to supply uncrowded, well-built homes on secure tenancies at reasonable rents.

The current policy adds to the national council shortage and disadvantages the people that need council housing
